entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
